query: The subset of activities 31, 32 is completed at the same time period
p:24/20: activity 20 must be completed before starting activity 24
p:31/24: activity 24 must be completed before starting activity 31
p:31/25: activity 25 must be completed before starting activity 31
p:32/31: activity 31 must be completed before starting activity 32
r:3/28: resource 3 is scarce at time period 28 due to activities 17, 2, 20, 22, 23, 25, 4
m: extends the length of the project beyond time period 40
